channel.title: Events on WICCA
channel.description: Recent content in Events on WICCA

item.title: Hack The Box NL
item.description: Mon, Dec 09, 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: KPN Teleport Hack The Box, the popular online platform to test and advance penetration testing skills, has partnered up with the WICCA team to organise meetups in the Netherlands, where everyone can go crazy inside a HTB lab and hack the planet!!!!!!1! EVERYONE is welcome to join the HTB Meetup group, and especially WICCA members! To participate to this hacking adventure, register to the HTB NL group above and sign up for our first event on December 9.

item.title: ING: Hacking a Bank
item.description: Wed, Nov 27, 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: ING HUB HUB consists of 3 buildings: A, B and C. ING will organise this at the ground floor of the C-building, which is the long building facing Hotel Levell. ING is inviting WICCA to their awesome open-for-all CTF! Bring a laptop with Internet access! How to teach anyone to be a hacker Normally, Capture the Flag (CTF) events are organised for security enthusiasts only.
